about_the_game:
Chimkens is a creative and entertaining game that allows you to build your own levels using an intuitive editor and then share them with the community via Steam Workshop. With its simple building mechanics, players can easily create custom levels and share them with friends or other players online.

The game features a local cooperative mode (COOP) where two players can play together on the same computer, solving challenges collaboratively. The player collision system enables fun interactions, such as climbing on each other to reach higher objects, adding a unique layer of teamwork. Additionally, the game incorporates competitive elements, ensuring both fun and challenging gameplay.

Players can save, edit, and test their levels directly in the game through a user-friendly level management menu. They can also browse community-created levels, download maps, apply filters to find specific content, and play levels instantly.

With Steam Workshop integration, players can effortlessly upload and share their creations, with an automated system that categorizes levels and generates preview images for each uploaded map.

Whether you want to build, compete, or cooperate with friends, Chimkens offers simple yet engaging gameplay that continuously encourages players to create, explore, and enjoy user-generated content.
